titles.title: O That The Lord Would Guide My Ways

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O that the Lord would guide my ways To keep His statutes still! O that my God would grant me grace To know and do His will!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O send Thy Spirit down to write Thy law upon my heart! Nor let my tongue indulge deceit, Nor act the liar's part.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: From vanity turn off mine eyes; Let no corrupt design, Nor covetous desires arise Within this soul of mine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Order my footsteps by Thy Word, And make my heart sincere; Let sin have no dominion, Lord, But keep my conscience clear.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Assist my soul, too apt to stray, A stricter watch to keep; And should I e'er forget Thy way, Restore Thy wand'ring sheep.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Make me to walk in Thy commands, 'Tis a delightful road;
Nor let my head, or heart, or hands, Offend against my God.
